mapper.select: SELECT ingredient.ingredient_id AS ingredientId, ingredient.ingredient_name AS ingredientName, ingredient.ingredient_detail_name AS ingredientDetailName, sum(fame.fav) AS popularity FROM ingredient join (( SELECT ingredient_id, (COUNT(*)*3) AS fav FROM favorite GROUP BY ingredient_id ) UNION ( SELECT ingredient_id, COUNT(*) AS fav FROM watch WHERE MONTH(watch.watch_date) = MONTH(current_date()) GROUP BY ingredient_id )) AS fame ON ingredient.ingredient_id = fame.ingredient_id GROUP BY fame.ingredient_id ORDER BY SUM(fame.fav) DESC LIMIT 5;
